### Get linux kernel
```
apk add linux-[NAME OF KERNEL] #linux-edge,linux-lts,etc
```

### configure boot kernel
edit `/boot/extlinux.conf`.
like below: 
```
# Generated by update-extlinux 6.1.38-r0
DEFAULT menu.c32
PROMPT 0
MENU TITLE Alpine/Linux Boot Menu 
MENU HIDDEN
MENU AUTOBOOT Alpine will be booted automatically in # seconds.
TIMEOUT 10
LABEL lts 
    MENU DEFAULT
    MENU LABEL Linux lts
    LINUX vmlinuz-lts
    INITRD initramfs-lts
    APPEND root=/dev/vg0/lv_root/ modules=sd-mod,usb-storage,ext4 quiet rootfstype=ext4
LABEL edge
    MENU DEFAULT
    MENU LABEL Linux edge
    LINUX vmlinuz-edge
    INITRD initramfs-edge
    APPEND root=/dev/vg0/lv_root/ modules=sd-mod,usb-storage,ext4 quiet rootfstype=ext4

MENU SEPARATOR
```
To
```
# Generated by update-extlinux 6.04_pre1-r15
DEFAULT menu.c32
PROMPT 0
MENU TITLE Alpine/Linux Boot Menu 
MENU HIDDEN
MENU AUTOBOOT Alpine will be booted automatically in # seconds.
TIMEOUT 10
#LABEL lts 
#    MENU DEFAULT
#    MENU LABEL Linux lts
#    LINUX vmlinuz-lts
#    INITRD initramfs-lts
#    APPEND root=/dev/vg0/lv_root/ modules=sd-mod,usb-storage,ext4 quiet rootfstype=ext4
LABEL edge
    MENU DEFAULT
    MENU LABEL Linux edge
    LINUX vmlinuz-edge
    INITRD initramfs-edge
    APPEND root=/dev/vg0/lv_root/ modules=sd-mod,usb-storage,ext4 quiet rootfstype=ext4

MENU SEPARATOR
```
